video_prompt: POV shot, young blonde woman biking through a tree-lined path. Wind-swept hair, wide smile, head and torso centered. Dynamic movement, forward gaze. Blurring background trees and path. Her hands grip handlebars, while brake lever and cable briefly appear. Focus on the exhilarating motion and joyful expression of a bike ride.
image_prompt: joyful blonde woman biking on a tree-lined path, POV shot, windblown hair, smiling, light blue t-shirt, dark blue jeans, prominent silver handlebars with grey and black fingerless gloves, dynamic, sunlit forest background, warm brown path with stones.
refined_video_prompt: Forward motion propels the scene as a rider bikes, her wind-swept hair flowing dynamically. A wide, joyful smile radiates as the surrounding trees and path blur rapidly, conveying exhilarating speed. The subject's head and torso remain steady while the background streaks past. A brake lever and cable briefly shift into view, emphasizing the kinetic energy and thrilling ride.
